courses.title: Beginner Guitar Mastery
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of playing the guitar, including chords, strumming, and basic melodies.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Enhance your piano skills with advanced scales, improvisation, and classical compositions.

courses.title: Classical Violin Essentials
courses.description: Master the basics of violin playing, including bowing techniques and classical pieces and many more details.

courses.title: Music Theory Fundamentals
courses.description: Understand the core concepts of music theory, including scales, chords, and harmonization.

courses.title: Indian Classical Vocals
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of Hindustani classical singing, including ragas and taals. Know the true essesnce of indian music.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Dive into the world of electronic music, beat making, and sound design using modern DAWs.

courses.title: Jazz Saxophone Improvisation
courses.description: Explore jazz improvisation techniques and develop your own unique saxophone sound.

courses.title: Drumming for Beginners
courses.description: Start your drumming journey with rhythm basics, drum grooves, and hand techniques.

courses.title: Bollywood Playback Singing
courses.description: Train your voice for Bollywood-style singing, breath control, and vocal modulation.

courses.title: Ukulele for Beginners
courses.description: Learn to play the ukulele with basic chords, strumming techniques, and fun songs.
